TopicTitle: Building our own command pods and engines

Articles.Content:
What do you guys/girls think? 

Would anyone else like to see this feature be added?

I think it would give us much greater freedom with what we would like from our spacecraft in terms of performance and versatility.

Same with our engines.

I like it! But a lot has to happen before we're able to. 

Eventually we'll see KSP or a different product grow into providing more detail. Biggest hurdle: the computational power of today's computers.

Some people don't like detail, others crave it like the sun. We'll find a middle ground eventually.
